column5: Hi all, Finally got round to putting together the footage of a great Lac sul outing that we took this summer with my son, his grandad, myself and the pup. Great memories and grandad has been boasting to all his buddies about how great a fisherman jack is, really winding up his buddies down at Erieau about how he out fishes them 3 times a week....lol...with an ice fishing pole!VIDEOhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DFKqm7Gxt9o
Excellent job on the guide service Jack! Glad you were able to leave a couple fish for Gramps and Dad!
